1.question: Mrs. Hilt met 15 friends. Nine of the friends were carrying pears. The rest were carrying oranges. How many friends were carrying oranges?

3.question: Mrs. Hilt bought 2 pizzas. Each pizza had 8 slices. How many total slices of pizza did she have?

2.question: Mrs. Hilt spent 25 cents on one caramel apple and 15 cents on one ice cream cone. How much more did the apple cost?

5.question: Mrs. Hilt ate 5 apples every hour. How many apples had she eaten at the end of 3 hours?

4.question: Mrs. Hilt read 2 books per day. How many books did she read in one week?

6.question: Mrs. Hilt gave 2 pieces of candy to each student in the group. The group had a total of 9 students in it. How many pieces of candy did Mrs. Hilt give away?
